text: Brie Bella has been suffering from'mom guilt.'The 34 - year - old wrestler struggled to know when was best to stop breastfeeding daughter Birdie, 17 months, and felt terrible when her milk supply began to dwindle and she had to introduce a bottle of formula to supplement the tot's feeding schedule. In a clip from an upcoming episode of Total Divas, Brie visited a breastfeeding support group and told the assembled women :'My breast milk's taken a huge dip. Mom guilt : Brie Bella, who shares 17 - months - old Birdie with husband and fellow wrestler Daniel Bryan, 37, has admitted she felt awful when her milk supply began to dwindle and she had to feed her tot formula, in a clip from an upcoming episode of Total Divas '
